caption.p: The pathological change of infected mice lungs treated with LQ combined with oseltamivir after infection with influenza B. (a) Uninfected. (b) Treated with 75 mg/kg/day of ribavirin. (c) Placebo. (d–f) Treated with 200 mg/kg/day of LQ combined with 50/10/2 mg/kg/day of oseltamivir. (g–i) Treated with 50/10/2 mg/kg/day of oseltamivir.
